description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Tarragon Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Tarragon Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chicken with the roasted bread and roasted garlic. Squeeze over the roasted lemons and any pan juices.
